comment.author: 39191857@N05
comment._content: My mother told me about this long before I became familiar with Templemore and its environs!  Her mother and some local ladies in Limerick hired a "Charabanc" for the day to take them there to witness the "miracle".  It was all a hoax of course, the nice Mr. Walsh had pigs blood in a puffer connected to the face of the statue and he would send a pulse of blood from the eyes of the statue when the praying was going full swing, the hysteria was massive.  The moving statue of Ballinspittle of more recent times was a lot more innocent than this fraud!  This is the first time I ever saw a photograph of though so nice one NLI, this is brilliant!
